snippet: Maxell's AirStash lets you transfer memory-consuming movies, music and other files off your iOS device and onto a USB-powered dongle that can stream to your iPhone or iPad.
abstract: Maxell's AirStash lets you transfer memory-consuming movies, music and other files off your iOS device and onto a USB-powered dongle that can stream to your iPhone or iPad.

headline.print_headline: A Little Hot Spot That Also Provides Extra Storage
